mean_en: a statement or description that makes something seem larger, better, worse or more important than it really is; the act of making a statement like this
sentence: Saying he had caught a fish bigger than a man was a great exaggeration!
sentence_trans: 他极尽夸张之能事，声称自己钓到了一条比人还大的鱼！
word_etyma: exaggerat夸大 ＋ ion表示行为、过程或结果 → exaggeration夸张，夸大之词
